Hydroides dianthus (Verrill, 1874 )

., 1 spec. (PMR- 17617 ).

NEW

REMARKS : The Adriatic records reported in the literature as
Serpula uncinata (Philippi, 1844 )
,
Eupomatus uncinatus (Philippi, 1844 )
and
Hydroides uncinata Philippi, 1844
are herein attributed to
H. pseudouncinatus pseudouncinatus
.
DISTRIBUTION : NA .

RECORDS

;

;
Castelli et al . 2008
.
